=INSERT INTO exchange_rates (date, from_currency, to_currency, rate, source)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.date }}',
  '{{ $json.from_currency }}',
  '{{ $json.to_currency }}',
  {{ $json.rate }},
  '{{ $json.source }}'
)
ON CONFLICT (date, from_currency, to_currency)
DO UPDATE SET
  rate = EXCLUDED.rate,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING *;
